item.title: Model steady flow in conduits
item.description: The infrastructure like transmission grids, distribution grids, district heating, gas transportation, and thermodynamic cycle can be modelled in a similar way, at least when they are in steady state. A special type of bipartite consisting two types of buses is brought up here.

item.title: "cmdict" for German vocabulary
item.description: Most of the content for German vocabulary is crawled online.

item.title: Notes for Spanning Arborescence
item.description: Here are the notes for three algorithms of spanning arborescences of some directed graph.

item.title: Snapshots for a Graph in Database
item.description: A data structure to store, modify, query temporal evolutions and subgraphs of some graph is proposed in this post, in order to handle issues discussed in the previous post, relational database not for power grids. There are more benefits.

item.title: Spring 2021
item.description: Here are some photos I took in spring in Copenhagen (CPH), Denmark and Essen, Germany.

item.title: 404 Not Found
item.description: This page is automatically loaded, when the page you requested cannot be found.

item.title: Relational Database not for Power Grids
item.description: After my 5-month part-time job at Utiligize, I begin to understand the problems in incumbent open-sourced tools for power system analysis.

item.title: Resume and Cover Letter
item.description: The resume played an important role in my last year at the university, because it forces me to think about what I can do and want. The best way to improve it is to receive feedback from others. In addition, there are some key points that I want to talk about. Some advice on cover letter writing is given in the last section.

item.title: 2.5 Years at DTU
item.description: I have graduated from DTU with a MSc in Engineering. Here are some points that worth mentioning.

item.title: Power Grid as Multilayer Network
item.description: A power grid with multiple voltage levels can be modelled using a multilayer network. A graph in each layer represents all the cables at the same voltage level. A directed bipartite for a pair of adjacent layers consists of transformers connecting two voltage levels.

item.title: Lyngby, Winter 2021
item.description: Here are some photos I took in winter in Lyngby, Denmark.

item.title: Teaching Assistant for Stochastic Simulation
item.description: In June, 2020, I worked as teaching assistant (TA) for stochastic simulation at Technical University of Denmark. The course consists of 6 lecture days (3 hours lecture and 4 hours exercise per day) and a group project. Because of the COVID-19 pandemic, everything has to be done online, which made it harder for everyone.

item.title: About
item.description: Edward just earned an MSc in engineering from Technical University of Denmark (DTU), and work as a mathematical modeller / software engineer at encoord in Essen, Germany. He is familiar with techniques from mathematical simulation, mathematical modelling and graph theory. Currently, He is contributing to zequnyu/cmdict and edxu96/mgrid. You can know more about him through https://edxu96.github.io/ and have a look at his resume. His email address is github_username[at]outlook[dot]com. 中文简介 许杰： 工学学士，重庆大学 工学硕士，丹麦技术大学 德国埃森 数

item.title: 英译中：阿波罗岩石样本引发了对月球形成的激烈讨论
item.description: 一项新的研究表明，地球和月球在成分上存在明显差异，这有助于解释月球的形成。

item.title: 我和丹麦的那些故事（五十七）
item.description: 构思了一年多的硕士毕设提案终于通过了开题审核，接下来的任务就是把它变成现实。从一次睡觉前的灵感爆棚，到现在的 12 页开题报告，这一年多在丹麦的学习生活很不容易。每天入睡前都要思考两个问题，想法可不可行，有没有类似的想法。但只靠想是不够的，更需要阅读和写作，以及朋友的帮助。

item.title: 择校课程、产业现状和研究团队最重要
item.description: 新能源是一个跨学科的领域，我在本科期间没有很明确的研究对象，所以研究生择校和专业选择的时候有很多选项，经过半学期 DIY 的摸索，我个人认为对于择校和专业选择来说，课程、产业现状和研究团队是最重要的。

item.title: 生涯人物故事：“认识自己”最重要
item.description: 本科毕业时的一篇总结文章。

item.title: Personal Statement for MSc at DTU
item.description: This is the personal statement I wrote, when I applied for MSc in Sustainable Energy - Energy System Analysis at Technical University of Denmark (DTU).
The “_index.md” file in a folder in this directory will be displayed in the pages for the corresponding tag. The parameter title should be set as the tag name.
